TextView.android:text: Prior to N, when drag enters into child of a view that has already received an ACTION_DRAG_ENTERED event, the parent doesn't get a ACTION_DRAG_EXITED event. ACTION_DRAG_LOCATION and ACTION_DROP were delivered to the parent of a view that returned false from its event handler for these events. Starting from N, the parent will get ACTION_DRAG_EXITED event before the child gets its ACTION_DRAG_ENTERED. ACTION_DRAG_LOCATION and ACTION_DROP are never propagated to the parent. sCascadedDragDrop is true for pre-N apps for backwards compatibility implementation.Prior to N, when drag enters into child of a view that has already received an ACTION_DRAG_ENTERED event, the parent doesn't get a ACTION_DRAG_EXITED event.
